Log.SystemErrors: Value TRUE : Log execution errors, incorrect input file errors, ... Value FALSE : Do not log errors.
Log.AllActions: Value TRUE : Log all actions. Value FALSE : Do not log actions, not even on action errors.
Log.OnlyActionErrors: Value TRUE : Log only actions that failed. Value FALSE : Do not log failed actions. Ignore the value when AllActions is TRUE.
Log.Folder: Value '..\Logs' : Path relative to the script. Value 'C:\MyApp\Logs' : An absolute path. Value NULL : Create no log file.
Log.FileExtension: Value '.xlsx' : Create an Excel log file. Value '.txt' : Create a text log file. Value '.csv' : Create a comma separated log file. The value is ignored when LogFolder is NULL.
Log.ToEventLog: Value TRUE : Log verbose to event log. Value FALSE : Do not log messages to the event log.
